p: Moreover, we checked the possible autocorrelation on our dendrochronological time-series (with an autocorrelation function, acf implemented R Development Core Team 2018). The resulting plot (Fig. 9) shows a significant correlation at lag 1 (≈1), lag 2 (≈0.5) and lag 13 (≈0.4) that decreases after a few lags. This pattern indicates an autoregressive term. Therefore, we used the partial autocorrelation function to determine the order of the autoregressive term (Fig. 10).
